data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Anderson, M. Eric, Somerville, Russell, Copley, Jonathan T. (2016): A new species of Pachycara Zugmayer, 1911 (Teleostei: Zoarcidae) from deep-sea chemosynthetic environments in the Caribbean Sea. Zootaxa 4066 (1): 71-77, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4066.1.5
